identity.name: CMV Master
identity.description: A professional tool for hamburger shop owners that balances the raw appeal of food with the cold precision of finance.

usage.labels: font-secondary text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500

primary.description: Rose 700 - The color of premium meat and heat. Use for primary actions.

secondary.description: Amber 500 - The color of buns and cheese. Use for warnings or secondary highlights.

background.description: Clean, sterile kitchen surface (Light) vs Late night service (Dark).

rules.gradients: Avoid gradients. Use solid, high-contrast colors for data clarity.
rules.text_contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use Slate-900 for main text, Slate-500 for secondary.
rules.borders: Use subtle borders (Slate-200) to define areas, not shadows.

layout.structure: Sidebar Navigation + Top Header + Main Content Area
layout.grid_system: Tailwind Grid. Dashboard uses 'Bento' layout (mixed spans). Data pages use full-width tables.
layout.card_style: bg-white dark:bg-zinc-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-zinc-800 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-rose-700 hover:bg-rose-800 text-white rounded-lg h-10 px-6 font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg h-10 px-4 font-medium

inputs.style: h-11 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-rose-100 focus:border-rose-500 rounded-lg text-base

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 font-semibold uppercase text-xs tracking-wider py-3 px-4 border-b border-slate-200

cards.metric: p-6 flex flex-col justify-between h-full relative overflow-hidden group

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for modals. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl (12px) for containers, rounded-lg (8px) for internal elements.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

login_bg.usage: Full screen background for Login page with black overlay (opacity 60%)

ingredients_hero.usage: Header banner for Ingredients tab or empty state

chef_context.usage: Dashboard welcome widget or profile default

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. Use text-slate-900 on light backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use .js extension for all React files.
Implement the Sidebar layout with the 4 requested tabs: Ingredients, Purchases (Compras), Products (Ficha Técnica), Reports (Relatórios).
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it a distinct personality.
Ensure the 'Purchases' form is optimized for speed (tab index, clear labels).
The 'Products' tab must allow adding ingredients to a product to calculate the cost (Recipe logic).
Use the provided image URLs for the Login page and Dashboard widgets.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows).
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; stick to the clean white/slate palette.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
